name: Eagle Lander 3D
description:
Your favourite moon landing simulator Eagle Lander is back with 3D graphics and improved gameplay!

Fly from outside or take control inside the LM cockpit to make a safe landing on the Lunar surface. Land smoothly or you'll risk damaging the lunar module and becoming stranded!

Land as smoothly and efficiently as you can to see how you stack up against others on the leaderboards.
